name: Jenny & Blue
description:
You're Blue, a teenage girl, thinking of asking out Jenny over a Discord call, the coolest girl you've ever known. Spend a few minutes working up the courage to ask her out as you hang out in your bedroom as it rains outside. 

  • First Person 
  • Dialogue Choices
  • Pick up objects in the room and throw them around!
  • (G)I-DLE poster in your room!

Controls: Use the number keys to pick  dialogue options. After all dialogue is finished, you can stay in the room. There's no quit button. 

This is essentially a prototype to see if I would like a game that was fully focused on dialogue without any extra stuff. Let me know what you think! 

- Chris M. Ferguson
